

cop(9,1000,1000)
cop(9,1000,800)
cop(9,1000,600)
cop(9,1000,400)
cop(9,1000,200)
cop(9,1000,0)
cop(9,1000,-200)
cop(9,-1000,1000)
cop(9,-1000,800)
cop(9,-1000,600)
cop(9,-1000,400)
cop(9,-1000,200)

cop(9,-1000,0)
cop(9,-1000,-200)
cop(9,-1000,-400)



snap(-2,-43,-60)

sky(255,255,191)
fog(223,209,195)
ground(191,191,191)

fadefrom(8000)


name(GRAND DAD FEST 2016)
nlaps(50)
lightson()

set(10,0,0,250,0)p
set(14,0,4550,250,0)pt
set(10,4550,4550,250,90)p
chk(40,5670,4550,250,90)
set(14,9100,4550,250,-90)pt
set(26,7630,4550,250,-90)
set(10,9100,0,250,0)pt
set(14,9100,-4550,250,180)p
set(26,3626,-122,250,90)
set(26,5516,-122,250,-90)
set(26,4592,928,250,0)pr
set(10,4550,-4550,250,-90)
set(26,4592,-1256,250,180)
chk(40,3710,-4550,250,90)
set(14,0,-4550,250,90)pt
set(26,1960,-4550,250,90)p
set(26,13320,-660,250,90)p
set(26,5100,8820,250,180)p
set(26,-4080,-420,250,-90)p
set(26,5700,-9480,250,0)p

maxl(6,-9780,-12330)
maxb(6,-14730,-7380)
maxr(6,19020,-12330)
maxt(6,14070,-7380)
